faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my data secure with the SaaS version?
faq.a1: Absolutely. We use AES-256 encryption for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for data in transit. Our data centers are SOC 2 Type II certified.
faq.q2: How does the On-Premise deployment work?
faq.a2: We provide a Docker container image that you can deploy in your own infrastructure (AWS, Azure, or private data center). You manage the database and storage.
faq.q3: Can I integrate with my existing ERP/CRM?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer a comprehensive REST API and Webhooks that allow you to integrate signing workflows directly into your existing applications.
faq.q4: What happens if I need to upgrade from SaaS to On-Prem?
faq.a4: Migration is seamless. We provide tools to export your data and audit logs from our cloud to your private instance.
